Certificate.definition: a document containing a certified statement esp. as to the truth of something [a birth ] b

1 a.definition: a document containing a certified statement esp. as to the truth of something [a birth ]

sub_terms.b: a document certifying that a person has fulfilled the requirements of and may practice in a specified field [a teaching ]

2.definition: [the signature…constitutes a that the attorney or party has read the document ""]

3.definition: a document that is proof of ownership or indebtedness [stock] [gold][sər-ti-fi-kāt] vt

-cat·ing.definition: to testify or authorize by a certificateto recognize as having met special qualifications (as of a governmental agency or professional board) within a field see alsoat
